website_summaries.verdict: One of the few bike inner tubes capable of sealing when a thorn or other foreign object punctures the skin.
pros: Internal slime sealant works quickly to cover a new puncture while riding
Helps to reduce the amount of flats commonly found on mountain biking trails
cons: Internal sealant can make it more difficult to replace the inner tube if necessary

customer_reviews.title: Tube failed on the seam and the valve
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these tubes, hoping to avoid replacing and repairing tubes in the future. I installed them into my bike one evening, and I didn't ride for a couple days. When I came into the garage to ride, the front tire was flat. I took the tube off the bike to look at it, and I found green slime leaking out of a dime-sized hole and rip near the seam, and also slime leaking out of the base of the valve stem. This looks like a product defect to me. I would probably not buy this tube again. For reference, I inflated it to 45psi per my tire's specification.
customer_reviews.author: David Smith

customer_reviews.title: These tubes are JUNK!
customer_reviews.text: These tubes have an apparent product flaw. After installing 2 tubes on Monday, I was ready to ride. Tuesday morning got bike out and discovered flat rear tire. Removed tube and found 1-1/2” split located on inner diameter of tube. Green crap all over. Cleaned everything up and replaced with new tube. Tuesday evening got bike out to ride again. Now it has a flat front tire and another split tube. I will have to replace a second brand new tube in one day and have yet to ride my bike! These tubes are JUNK!! Great Amazon service to get delivery in 2 days of a product that is unusable. Don’t waste your time!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Failure!
customer_reviews.text: BOTH the tubes I ordered burst when correctly inflated, correctly installed into the correct size wheel and tire, all in good condition. These failures were due to tube material splitting, see photo, rather than any puncture. Failures happened within 24 hrs of installation. Can the manufacturer please replace these tubes?
customer_reviews.author: mg

customer_reviews.title: Looks right
customer_reviews.text: The demand for a review follows the delivery by a few hours. I ordered these as spares. I really can't rate it until I use it. With any luck, I'll never use it, but my commute is on local and county roads that are littered with treasures, ranging from broken hardware to discarded household trash. My last tire change was a few months ago, and I put my first Slime Smart tire on then, purchased as a spare at the LBS more than a year before. It's been performing as expected the last few months. These were ordered to replace that spare. I'll try to remember to update my review if (when) I have to use these.
customer_reviews.author: Dave S

customer_reviews.title: These are defective, perhaps it’s just the batch I got, but both in the 2 pack had the same failure.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used these before and they were fine. BUT, I recently needed a new tire and tube, I got two of these tubes. They are BAD... not even worth one star. The first one got a leak after 60 miles, then the 2nd tube got a leak after 75 miles. In both cases it was the tube splitting, nothing went through the tire, and both of the holes were on the rim side not the roa side, so they do not seal. This looks like a defect along or near a seam. I have never had this problem in 120,000 miles of riding, these are defective.
customer_reviews.author: RB

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as advertised
customer_reviews.text: I've used slime tubes for years. My last tube lasted for 4+ years (few hundred miles). I replaced it because it was coming apart on the wheel side of the tube. I wasn't picking up thorns or nails, the wheel had a sharp spot that finally wore through the tube. Figured it was time to replace it.
customer_reviews.author: Tom O'Connell

customer_reviews.title: Good Tubes but big
customer_reviews.text: I ordered tubes to fit a 26" rim but after laying them in the tires and had about 6" extra tube. managed to tuck them in the tires and try to evenly space a little extra all around and finished putting tires on. but I question the correctness of the sizing. Once filled with air seem to be ok. but only time will really tell if the extra tube length will be an issue. At this time it all appears to be good.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Slime Smart Tube Good Value
customer_reviews.text: I decided with all this lockdown stuff that I needed to break out my mountain bike so I can get some fresh air. My oldest who is a bike guru said that the bike was fine; that I just needed to replace my inner tubes. I got the Slime Smart Tube. These are suppose to be self sealing if there is a puncture. I haven't worked on a bike in years but I followed the included instructions and the tubes were easy to install.
customer_reviews.author: L.R. Bowers Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Not puncture proof but self sealing small leaks
customer_reviews.text: Better than regular tubes but not puncher proof- even with slime tire liners i still git a flat that would not seal!!Ran over a bolt that went through my tire AND AROUND the liner and into the tube and was too large to self seal or after to try and pump back up! Luckly i always carry a spare tube with me. The warranty would give you another one but it would cost you more in shipping than a new one. I'm going to wait until i have several to send back at the same time to be worth it!
customer_reviews.author: tom k.

customer_reviews.title: Slime Works!
customer_reviews.text: I had the new Slime innertubes installed on my 40+ year-old bike. I did experience a flat, but once we added more air - the tires retained the air! I'm pleased with the product and would recommend it to anyone looking to replace an innertube in you bicycle tires.
customer_reviews.author: CATLADY

customer_reviews.title: The thin slime is a bother
customer_reviews.text: I would not buy these again. The thin, green slime comes out when I add air to the tire or when I use a pressure gauge. This gets in the chuck or gauge and has to be cleaned out before it gums up the works. It also has to be cleaned off the wheel rim. When spinning the wheels when the bike is on the work stand, the slime settles in one place and causes the wheel to be very unbalanced. I don't feel this when riding. This might settle out with time or it might eventually turn gummy and stay in one place--I don't know what to expect.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis L. Allen

customer_reviews.title: Bad valve core out of the box
customer_reviews.text: These arrived quickly enough. I purchased 4, have installed 2, the others are on the shelf to be installed on my wife's bike soon. Out of the box, a few quick pumps to 'shape it up' and installed with new tires.. One of these has a leak at the valve core. Thankfully I have 2 old tubes here to pull a valve core from to get on the road, but so far we're 50% defective from the get go. I keep slime around for my 4 wheeler tires, it works great, but this is the first time I've bought tubes with it already in them, and if this is the quality I can expect it will be the last.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Williamson

customer_reviews.title: CHECK FOR LEAKAGE BEFORE USE!!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased 4 of these inner tube and 2 out of the 4 had small holes. Before even riding the tire was flat again. check the tube for leak and sure enough there was a pin hole. Check the product before installation. I Do Not Trust This Company Anymore!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It Worked!
customer_reviews.text: These arent too much more expensive than standard tubes, so I figured I'd give them a shot, but wasnt sure if I'd ever know if they were working. Two weeks ago, I pulled a fat thorn out of my tire and it started hissing like mad. Bummer, I thought, it must have been too wide for the slime. I pumped up the tire and little and to my amazement, the hissing stopped. The tire has had no issues and I've ridden ~50 miles on it since. Now I'm waiting for the intertubes on my other bikes to fail so I can have the comfort of replacing them all with slime tubes!
customer_reviews.author: SnapSnazzy

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this product
customer_reviews.text: I am 65!!! I ride my electric bike 30 miles 4-5 times a week........on the street, dirt trails, bike path and slightly graveled paths and I am telling you.....when I decide to have the Bike shop guy ck out my tubes...........he does the baby powder and water.....and we just watch it rain......soooooo many holes in my tubes.....but I NEVER EVER - did I say NEVER got a flat!!!!!!! Best product!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Wont hold air brand new out of the box
customer_reviews.text: Wow , I bought theese planning to get my bike up and going and the first day one of them wouldn't hold air. I guess it's bad from the factory and the self seal is useless. Wow goes flat in 20 seconds or less . Waste of money
customer_reviews.author: JUSTIN RICHARDSON

customer_reviews.title: Never got flat tires
customer_reviews.text: My son had a bike for a while and the tires were punctured and had to replace them twice a month. So we gave this product a try and we are now very satisfied. After changing to this tires, his bike never has any flat tires for over 6 months. I highly recommend to try this tire if you have a teenager who drives the bike everyday on the road and off-road.
customer_reviews.author: 365 Days of Happiness

customer_reviews.title: Great tube for my giant cruiser
customer_reviews.text: Great tube for my giant cruiser. I kept picking up goatheads and getting micro punctures, I was constantly airing up my tires and replacing tubes, even with a good thorn guard, these tubes have resolved this issue. Flat/slow leak free for a month now. Same riding pattern, same tires.
customer_reviews.author: Mars

customer_reviews.title: Bought Three, All Three Failed
customer_reviews.text: I bought three of these. All three failed, splitting at various locations on the tube, either upon initial inflation or within a few hours being parked. I’ve been fixing tires for 50 years, started with tubed bicycle tires. Slime is a good product, but putting it into truly bad tubes is Inexcusable.
customer_reviews.author: Lane D.

customer_reviews.title: Great tubes!
customer_reviews.text: i dont mind having a heavier tube, but these seem to be a value. The slime takes about a mile or two to spread evenly and then the ride noticeably smooths out. They are not run-flats but give you a little extra time to pedal after a puncture before you haveto walk or chabge the tube :)
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Split Open at seem
customer_reviews.text: I bought these so I could have an extra tube. one tube was / is fine. other tube I put in today and it split at seem. was at 37 PSI. return window is closed. so a waste
customer_reviews.author: Luiz I.

customer_reviews.title: Tried three tubes all either won't inflate or don't hold air
customer_reviews.text: A bike tube has one job to do, and these don't do it.l The first pair I received had one tube that wouldn't inflate, and the other didn't hold air for 24 hours. I got two replacement tubes and the first one out of the box wouldn't inflate. Returning again and trying a different brand.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Detective Garbage
customer_reviews.text: Ordered a 2-pack, and both tubes arrived with holes in them. Would not hold air. Got green goo everywhere.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: What the hell dude.
customer_reviews.text: Sealant does not seal. It just bleeds out. I haven’t even used the tube longer than 28 miles.
customer_reviews.author: BankOfBur

customer_reviews.title: Incorrect sizing
customer_reviews.text: The size listed on the box did not match the what was inside it. I've purchased other brands in this same size and they fit my tires perfectly. This was for a tire at least two inches bigger than what I thought I was getting.
customer_reviews.author: Ronnie B.

customer_reviews.title: Terrible Durability
customer_reviews.text: I bought the 2 pack. Installed one tube on the front and it has lasted over 100 miles. The tube on the back lasted for 40 miles, it developed a small pin hole which would not seal. Needless to say I will not be wasting my money on slime tubes in the future.
customer_reviews.author: scott singer

customer_reviews.title: Slime Smart Tube Schrader Valve Bicycle Self Sealing Tire Tube
customer_reviews.text: This Slime Smart Self Sealing Tire Tube has worked out well. I have had it six weeks and it has not gone flat. The tube may seem too big for your tire when you first look at it. You have to "partially" inflate it and then put it inside your tire. I would order again.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Defective
customer_reviews.text: I installed the new tub in a new tire , air it up to 50 lbs and POP. Put my old tube in and its fine. I would like a refund
customer_reviews.author: marlene a kemp

customer_reviews.title: Failures
customer_reviews.text: Had one fail at the valve stem. Seperated iteself first night riding only 6 miles. Other did not seal or unknown pinhole but cannot keep air even when adding more slime.
customer_reviews.author: GZTCZB

customer_reviews.title: Good price, normal installation and hopefully no flats.
customer_reviews.text: Installs like a regular bike tube, the price was good and will see if it works when I get a flat. But if I do get a flat then I guess it didn’t work. Ha ha. Extra precaution doesn’t hurt.
customer_reviews.author: Armando Garciacano

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product!
customer_reviews.text: Cannot comment on how well it seals a hole after the tire is punctured and hopefully will never notice. Did notice the tube itself is thicker and easy to work with. Am a firm believer of the "Slime" product so I have confidence that this tire will perform as expected....
customer_reviews.author: TAZ67

customer_reviews.title: 50/50; would not buy again.
customer_reviews.text: ugh. So one worked fine and the other not so much. I bought two of these to replace the tubes in an older mountain bike. There was something "defective" with the stem on one of the two I bought. I was just shy of the Amazon, "warranty", so I am stuck with one piece of junk and one decently functioning tire tube.
customer_reviews.author: David Matheus

customer_reviews.title: Fingers crossed
customer_reviews.text: Noticed the tubes are fairly heavy due to the Slime that is inside, but hopefully they work as advertised and in conjunction with a good puncture resistant tire will provide trouble-free riding for a couple years. If I get any type of puncture, I'll try to update this review.
customer_reviews.author: Alan

customer_reviews.title: It just doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: Not once did the slime do its job, considering I can get thicker tube for $5 here on amazon, I'll never buy this again. 3 tubes, none worked.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: do not buy, both tubes failed on inner seam.
customer_reviews.text: Installed new tube and used bike twice. One week later tire was flat with ruptured seam on the inside of the tube near valve stem. (checked rim, no protrusions to cause break). Installed new tube and inflated to recommended range (45-65 PSI range, inflated to 60) . Two hours later heard sound in garage and found tire flat. Tube had ruptured on inner seam 1/3 around tire from valve stem. Not a happy camper!
customer_reviews.author: Penny

customer_reviews.title: 50% chance your fine.
customer_reviews.text: Got a pair of brand new Slime tubes, installed them right out of the box and one of them seems to have burst at the seams. Slime doing nothing to patch this. It won't hold air. The other tube appears to be fine. I guess it's hit or miss with Slime. You either get a good value or you lose your investment.
customer_reviews.author: James Clark

customer_reviews.title: These shouldn't be sold on amazon...
customer_reviews.text: Terrible quality, way too big. Ordered and recieved a 26" but recieved one larger than the one it says it is. Won't last long whatsoever. DO NOT BUY!
customer_reviews.author: Faiyad C

customer_reviews.title: Not good customer service!!!
customer_reviews.text: When you buy a bike tire be sure to only buy 1 or the amount you need that day...do not buy a back up from this company. I needed. only 1 tire and did not get to put it on right away. The first tire in the pack had a huge hole in it. I contacted the company and they said to contact amazon...the time frame with emails made a return impossible...so I paid 22.00 for one bike tire....stay away from this company!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great fit
customer_reviews.text: This product was great for my bike! The fit was perfect and liked how it had the slime in the tube for future flats.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: A few days after installing these, I rode somewhere I should not have been and picked up dozens of thorns. As I plucked each one out, a little bubble of green goo oozed out. Two days later, I filled my tires, and took my bike on a forty-mile ride with no issues. I gave this five stars for value because I didn't have to replace them when I thought they would be shredded.
customer_reviews.author: Bob Zerrunkel

customer_reviews.title: heavy.  Designed for recreational use bikes.
customer_reviews.text: used for a bike for fun. Not designed for use in serious mountain/road/tri-bikes. Works as advertised
customer_reviews.author: craig van sciver

customer_reviews.title: Don't overfill
customer_reviews.text: These are normal thickness tubes with a small amount of slime in them. I do like the valve stem caps which double are stem removers and are easy to remove with the slime green color. BTW if you overfill and try to bleed off, you'll get slimed.
customer_reviews.author: B Decent

customer_reviews.title: Great Inner Tube, HORRIBLE SLIME DOES NOTHING EXCEPT SPRAY!
customer_reviews.text: This works good as a standard inner tube, and doesn't cost much more than a standard Schwinn inner tube, so I gave it 2 stars. But I have had TWO flats, and the slime did nothing but SQUIRT ALL OVER THE PLACE! Thanks for getting green gook all over my bike! TWICE!
customer_reviews.author: CC book

customer_reviews.title: We'll see
customer_reviews.text: Havent had them long but put them on my wifes bike. About a month later had to air the tires. The jury is out on how good they work.
customer_reviews.author: Civ

customer_reviews.title: Slime
customer_reviews.text: My bicycle repair shop does not like these tubes. Apparently they are hard to repair.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Suer

customer_reviews.title: Chemically unstable product and ankle sprains
customer_reviews.text: This product gets 0 stars out of 5 because the tube fails to stay in 1 piece on a hot summer day. I have purchased 4 total , all 4 have blown out whole riding in the hot summer heat. 3rd blow out happened in the street, put me on my ass, and left me with a sprained ankle. 4th blow out happened after I changed the tire, and exploded as I was attaching the wheel to the bike. This is a very chemically unstable product that does not last more than 2 hours once installed on your bicycle.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Don't pay extra for the slime tubes if you have a choice.
customer_reviews.text: An "okay" tire. I haven't notice any improvement over a standard non-slime tube. Run over a thorn, and I still get flats just like any other tube. Don't pay extra for this tube.
customer_reviews.author: Old Mountain Biker

customer_reviews.title: Don't Buy These Tubes!
customer_reviews.text: They are brand new and won't stay inflated. Have put air in the 2 times in a week and when I'm ready to use the bike will have to fill with air again until I can get new tubes.
customer_reviews.author: Kilaflys

customer_reviews.title: Good product, good value!
customer_reviews.text: Tubes work great however I had one a few years ago where I had a small hole and the sealant did not work. Others in the past worked well.
customer_reviews.author: BVA

customer_reviews.title: Slime Tubes - an extra precaution for cycling.
customer_reviews.text: An extra precaution for cycling. won't know until we ride over something nasty.....
customer_reviews.author: wallyd

customer_reviews.title: The product has a very poor quality
customer_reviews.text: I installed the two of them at a bike store with the proper air pressure and the next day one of them was flat. I came back to the bike store and it was completely cracked. Obviously it was rotten...and of course that green gel didnn't work at all. Didn't return it because I throwed all the container boxes from Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Jack White

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy this!!!! No good!!!
customer_reviews.text: These don't last long, every one I have bought is no good!!!!
customer_reviews.author: bonnie mckibbin

customer_reviews.title: Great when you're on the go with no pump,  but ride quickly to spread the slime evenly in the tube
customer_reviews.text: Fast shipping, good packaging and price point. Excellent product, but store at room temp, do not let freeze or overheat! And once you get the tube situated, ride quickly to evenly spread the ingredients. Thankfully I got a 2 pack, because the first try took some trial and error, but now that I've got it down, will always keep one on hand for off road adventures!
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: They work!
customer_reviews.text: You can tell they are "slimed" as they weigh more than a standard tube, but have been working on a adult tricycle that I use to haul a 6 gallon fuel tank to our boat a couple blocks away. I've had 2 boat batteries, 80 lbs, in the basket in back and hit tree roots and no pinch flats.
customer_reviews.author: Not dead yet, just old

customer_reviews.title: Do Not Buy This Item!
customer_reviews.text: Do Not Buy This Item! It blows in a couple minutes, and will put green slime all over your bike... I put my old tubes back in. Back to normal again, "Yeaah!" I only had 42 PSI in the tubes... Buyer, Beware... Grrrrrr!! This should have a negative 10 rating.
customer_reviews.author: Gehry Casey

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy this!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this two packs and both leaked out within two days of each other, I ride 6 days a week and I’ve never seen this before. Both leaks were due to seam splitting and that slime does nothing to seal the leak, walked home 2.5 miles the first time and 1 mile the second....buy something else with your hard earned money.
customer_reviews.author: david

customer_reviews.title: still go flat
customer_reviews.text: I've had it with these tubes. The smallest of pin holes and it still won't get me home when I hear a leak. The last 3 flats I've had I have found nothing stuck in the tire and the smallest of holes don't seal. I'm going with a Kevlar tire.
customer_reviews.author: Terrance Bryant

customer_reviews.title: I received tubes on time. Put front and rear ...
customer_reviews.text: I received tubes on time. Put front and rear tubes in, air, water tested for leaks, ok. Next day, rear flat. Took tube off and found rubber had split 2 in long along the fold [where folded from in box], 7 in from valve stem. No repair for that.
customer_reviews.author: Ken

customer_reviews.title: Get something else.
customer_reviews.text: These tubes are often defective. They burst at the seams or the valves leak, and sometimes the valve core is stuck because of hardened slime. The seller won’t even replace them, not that I’d use them anyway. I will NEVER buy these again.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Great inner tubes
customer_reviews.text: Great tubes for my cruiser bike, we have too many thorns in our area, I was replacing or patching my tubes 1 to 2 times a week. These seal up and have no problems
customer_reviews.author: Davis household

customer_reviews.title: Bummed... both defective.
customer_reviews.text: Bummed. Took forever to get these since people are riding a lot of bikes these days. Put one on and the next morning the bike was flat. Put the next one on, and the next day it was flat. Both had holes in the tube. Thankfully the seller is refunding my money.
customer_reviews.author: Becky Thompson

customer_reviews.title: great value
customer_reviews.text: have purchased standard tubes only to have them fail, I ride bike almost daily...these keep me on the road
customer_reviews.author: J. Morrill

customer_reviews.title: Both failed within a year
customer_reviews.text: This week, about a year after getting these, both tires failed within days of each other and won't hold air. Isn't the whole purpose of the slime to make sure this doesn't happen? Worst inner tubes I've ever had.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Mastron

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit, easy to use, no problems
customer_reviews.text: I replaced the factory installed tubes when repairing pinholes resulted in the whole tube splitting. These have been great. I highly recommend them and the price is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: D. Franklin

customer_reviews.title: Arrived with a hole
customer_reviews.text: This inner tube had a hole in it! Bought a while back to have on hand but when I installed it air began releasing from it the second after I finished pumping.
customer_reviews.author: Marshall McCready

customer_reviews.title: Best tire tubes ever!!!!
customer_reviews.text: These bicycle tubes are excellent. My standard tubes popped within days and i needed a durable substitute. These were perfect. It fit my 26 inch tires with ease and haven't popped from over 1 year of heavy usage.
customer_reviews.author: deansurgent7

customer_reviews.title: Boo
customer_reviews.text: All the tubes I bought were dry rotted and defective upon delivery like they had been sitting on a shelf for re along time
customer_reviews.author: marc doane

customer_reviews.title: Defective
customer_reviews.text: I apparently didn’t read the reviews till I has an issue with both tubes (I did get 2 packs of 2) the one set I used right away and had no issues. The second set I useD 3 months later and both tube ruptured at the same spot near the valve...within days of installation
customer_reviews.author: Jon L.

customer_reviews.title: slime filled 26 in bicycle inner tubes for mountain bike
customer_reviews.text: The product was a gift and was received in a timely manner but has not been installed as yet. When the tubes are installed, I will again review them. Right now they are just fine as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: terrance scroggin

customer_reviews.title: great for mountain biking on the trails
customer_reviews.text: seem to be holding up well with daily trail rides across rugged terrain
customer_reviews.author: Alysa Simms

customer_reviews.title: Great tubes
customer_reviews.text: I love these tubes, but I was sent the wrong sizes. Got 1 16" and 1 26" instead of the 2 26" I ordered.
customer_reviews.author: Nahnia Bidness

customer_reviews.title: Definitely not self sealing.
customer_reviews.text: Got a flat after a couple months of having it and it definitely did not self seal.
customer_reviews.author: Serj S.

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: I love the slime tubes. I rarely get flats. I installed the tube rather quickly and went for a spin. The tubes arrived earlier than I expected and I was thrilled. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Monica Treadwell

customer_reviews.title: Failure after only a few months
customer_reviews.text: My tube failed at the seam after only a few months after installation. Similar to what people have already posted.
customer_reviews.author: M. Caron

customer_reviews.title: Cheapest tubes I've ever owned
customer_reviews.text: Standard bike tube. Maybe I got a bad batch, but my tubes went flat within 2 days of installation. Not only did they not last, but they didn't seal the leak, either. Will not be buying again
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty
customer_reviews.text: Worked fine. Seem like extra thick rubber. I had no issues and they work fine
customer_reviews.author: Dan87quest

customer_reviews.title: Tube  blew out
customer_reviews.text: Bought two received two. Installed the first one and the tube blew out half way around the ring where valve stem is attached to the tube. No doubt a mfg problem. Tube was in correct tire and correct pressure was applied. Larry
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: sealed well after a run in with goat head thorns
customer_reviews.text: These work really well. I rode through a patch of goat head thorns and picked up 7-8 thorns in each tire. Many of the holes caused the slime goo to ooze all the way out through the tire, but they sealed up and held until I got home.
customer_reviews.author: S. H. Cannon

customer_reviews.title: easy to install
customer_reviews.text: so far so good, holding up. Easy to install, bike rides well down road.
customer_reviews.author: craigor

customer_reviews.title: Well that's not good...
customer_reviews.text: So... ordered them about a month after my accident w new tires... got them installed & pumped up to 40-ish psi today (almost 2 months later)... & BANG one just burst.
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME AWESOME PRODUCT !!!
customer_reviews.text: Just like that it has been months and the tubes fill any holes i get in them automatically! What a great investment! Thanks slime !!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Raul

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Does not work as advertised! Tiny thorns keep poking the tubes!
customer_reviews.author: AH

customer_reviews.title: Chinese garbage
customer_reviews.text: Terrible, self sealing? Started leaking immediately after installation. Don’t waste your money. More junk from CHINA
customer_reviews.author: gregory beach

customer_reviews.title: Don't believe the hype
customer_reviews.text: EPIC FAIL!!! 6 flats, 3 different tubes, 4 different occasions. Not worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: awhitman1970

customer_reviews.title: Lies I tell you family!
customer_reviews.text: Dont work & make a mess of your life lmao ok bike drama
customer_reviews.author: Derrick L.

customer_reviews.title: Good idea
customer_reviews.text: A little messy to air up if you're not careful with the air hose, but a good idea to incorporate the slime in the tube.
customer_reviews.author: J. P.

customer_reviews.title: it really works
customer_reviews.text: I pulled out a thorn, inflated it and kept rolling on my bike, so that a flat tire doesn't stop you. Now I'm lighter when I ride the bike paths.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Mitchel

customer_reviews.title: Multiple flats
customer_reviews.text: Purchased a two tube set to install in the two new tires I purchased, after multiple flats, I reinstalled the old tube. Upon inspection there is an obvious scarring pattern about a inch and a half in diameter. Very disappointed, this was to save me aggravation not create it
customer_reviews.author: Brian B.

customer_reviews.title: So far. So good
customer_reviews.text: I work in a shipyard. These have held up pretty good
customer_reviews.author: Cliff

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality
customer_reviews.text: Trust the poor reviews! These lasted one day before developing a leak, not a puncture, but a leak at the valve stem.
customer_reviews.author: TbarW

customer_reviews.title: Item missing out my order
customer_reviews.text: My order was missing a whole inner tube very unprofessional I won't buy again
customer_reviews.author: Aaron

customer_reviews.title: I'm 'On the Road Again??' - Thanks
customer_reviews.text: Just what I needed - quick delivery - product in great condition
customer_reviews.author: LPM

customer_reviews.title: Fit nice and snug around the inner rim of my 26” byatch cruiser
customer_reviews.text: Fit nice and snug around the inner rim of my 26” byatch cruiser
customer_reviews.author: EatmeNoww

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: Can't go wrong on these tubes. Worry free on flats from thorns and small punctures. BobB
customer_reviews.author: Bob B

customer_reviews.title: Happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.text: I've been getting plenty of use from these items. No more flat tires.
customer_reviews.author: Edgar

customer_reviews.title: Great tubes
customer_reviews.text: Love love love theae tubes... Havent had an issue since putting them in!
customer_reviews.author: sharon kate albin

customer_reviews.title: Both tubes failed after 1 week
customer_reviews.text: Changed the original flat and put in the first slimed tube. One ride later had a pinhole and the slimed failed to do the job. Put on the 2nd slimed tube and it failed around the valve stem. I have changed several tubes and been biking for years.... Think it was a bad lot or something but will not be ordering from this vendor again.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Not worth your money.
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed, installed these on my beach cruiser but they only hold air for about a week or so. Then they are COMPLETELY flat. Pain in the ass. Wish I had just gotten some regular tubes that actually hold air.
customer_reviews.author: Ron Quitevis

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: order arrived in good condition. Easy to install and use. I haven't ridden a lot of miles, but appears to be like original.
customer_reviews.author: amaguy

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: Installed holding air well, don't really know how self-sealing feature works yet
customer_reviews.author: J. Albertoni

product_meta.title: Slime Smart Tube Schrader Valve Bicycle Self SealingTube (26 x 1.75-2.125), 2 Pack
feature_bullets: Pre-installed with Slime Sealant to provide maximum puncture protection and prevent flat tires on your bike
Instantly and repeatedly seals tire punctures for up to 2 years
Designed to seal tread area punctures
